programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: The Slump: Peralta has more and more cases that he can't seem to solve. Holt asks Santiago to take charge of a community outreach programme for at-risk youth.

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: M.E. Time: Peralta annoys his colleagues when his attempts to get together with an attractive medical examiner delay an autopsy report.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Lisa's Sax: The family recall the story of when Lisa got her saxophone. It all started when the school psychologist told Marge and Homer that her talent needed to be nurtured...

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Coming to Homerica: When nearby Ogdenville's unemployed come to Springfield looking for jobs, Mayor Quimby shuts the town's borders and enlists private citizens to guard them.

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Couples Costume: Barry and Erica persuade Adam not to go trick-or-treating at Halloween, but to take his girlfriend Dana to visit a haunted house instead.

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Lucky: Barry badgers Murray into getting him a puppy. Beverly wants to join in with Erica and Lainey's pyjama party, but they won't let her.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Express Yourself: Phil has the crazy idea of going on a spontaneous trip to Paris with Claire. And Jay takes over their bathroom renovation.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Man Shouldn't Lie: Claire brings home a stray dog and gets the kids to help her hide it. And Cameron rents out the upstairs apartment to a Christian rock band.

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: The Bet: Peralta and Santiago's ongoing bet about who can make the most arrests comes to an awkward conclusion. Boyle gets a medal after he's shot in the line of duty.

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: The Ebony Falcon: Sergeant Jeffords returns to the field and goes undercover at a gym with Peralta and Boyle to investigate steroid-trafficking.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The Joy of Sect: The family join a cult that brainwashes its disciples into believing they will be taken to the planet Blisstonia, but Marge escapes and plans a rescue.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Das Bus: Bart, Lisa and their classmates fight to survive when they get stranded on a remote island after Otto drives the school bus off a bridge and into the sea.

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Sienna's attempts to build bridges with Cleo backfire. As Donny becomes the focus of a police investigation, Gemma takes a huge gamble. And there's a mysterious sighting at Jez's allotment.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The Devil Wears Nada: Marge becomes famous when she poses for a racy charity calendar. Mr Burns promotes Carl to supervisor.

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: Boxer Kirsty puts her gloves down to find love. Ambitious Rose meets Hugo, who wears a cravat but has never been on a date. And can Holly kick the habit of falling for bad boys?

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: On the 'box this time: Squid Game: The Challenge, I'm a Celebrity... Get Me Out of Here!, The Crown, Deal or No Deal, Planet Earth III, Made in Chelsea and Saving Lives at Sea.

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: What do Britain's top armchair critics think of Squid Game: The Challenge, The Couple Next Door, The Toy Hospital, Survivor, Vinnie Jones in the Country and Lorraine?

programme.title: Open House: The Great Sex...
programme.desc: ...Experiment: Helen and Steve want some more romance in their relationship... can the retreat fulfil their desires? Are Caius and Eli prepared for the reality of a threesome?

programme.title: Naked Attraction
programme.desc: The first episode of the daring dating show. Music producer Aina wants to find someone adventurous. Designer Mal, who has dated men and women, has all options laid bare before her.

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: Boxer Kirsty puts her gloves down to find love. Ambitious Rose meets Hugo, who wears a cravat but has never been on a date. And can Holly kick the habit of falling for bad boys?

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: On the 'box this time: Squid Game: The Challenge, I'm a Celebrity... Get Me Out of Here!, The Crown, Deal or No Deal, Planet Earth III, Made in Chelsea and Saving Lives at Sea.

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: What do Britain's top armchair critics think of Squid Game: The Challenge, The Couple Next Door, The Toy Hospital, Survivor, Vinnie Jones in the Country and Lorraine?

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Why're You Hitting Yourself?: Determined to get Pops to settle down, Beverly plays matchmaker for her father and pairs him up with a woman called Sophia.

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: The Ring: Beverly is furious when she discovers that her engagement ring is the same one that Murray gave to his former fianc√©e.

programme.title: Don't Tell the Bride
programme.desc: Beauty queen and bride-to-be Yasmin has her heart set on a fairytale wedding. Can powerlifter Yiannis deliver her dream nuptials with his Beauty and the Beast-themed day?

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Red Alert: Lily has reached a womanly milestone that Cam and Mitch are not prepared for at all. So they call in reinforcements...

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: The Wild: Mitch, Cam and Phil crash Jay's annual hiking trip to find an elusive bald eagle. And Gloria, Alex, Claire and Haley get together to plan a baby shower.

programme.title: Rude(ish) Tube Shorts
programme.desc: A short, cheeky clip featuring animals and food, from the always hilarious Tube that is Rude.

programme.title: Junior Bake Off
programme.desc: It's Biscuit Day, and the second heat of bakers go big in an epic Technical and make biscuits to break records. Who makes it through, and who'll snap?

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Grasshopper Also: In Carlstadt, New Jersey, Gordon Ramsay attempts to save the Grasshopper Also, a family-owned Irish restaurant that's on its last legs.

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Dance Party USA: Erica's dream opportunity to dance on a TV show turns into a nightmare. Adam takes to gambling at school.

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Bill/Murray: Adam and Beverly decide to film a music video to help Erica's application to Julliard stand out, while Murray bonds with Lainey's dad Bill.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: White Christmas: In an attempt to have the perfect white Christmas that she never had in Colombia, Gloria rents a cabin in the mountains for the whole family.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Playdates: Claire and Phil have dinner plans with a great couple they met on holiday. But they never pick up the bill, so Claire tells Phil to insist that they pay this time...

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Classic American: Best pals Colleen and Naomi bought Classic American in New York together, but their inexperience is pushing their friendship to the edge. Can Gordon help?

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Down City: Gordon Ramsay tries to save struggling restaurant Down City in Providence, Rhode Island. But tough-talking owner Abby refuses to take advice from anyone.

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: The Vulture: Peralta is irked when a detective from Major Crimes takes over a murder case that he's close to solving. Can he prevent the officer from stealing his thunder?

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Halloween: On a very busy Halloween night, Santiago - who hates the holiday - must don fancy dress and go undercover on a street patrol with Boyle.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The Homer They Fall: Homer becomes a boxer, thanks to his abnormally hard head. But is his skull strong enough for a fight against heavyweight champion Drederick Tatum?

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Bart Star: Homer takes over as the manager of Bart's American football team after forcing Ned to quit the position. Guest starring Mike Judge as Hank Hill.

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: In Conclusion, Thanksgiving: Adam exploits his father's soft spot for a popular song. Beverly wants Murray to invite his grouchy dad to Thanksgiving dinner.

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Wingmom: Murray agrees to let Barry join the junior Reserve Officers Training Corps, but when the going gets tough, Barry begs Beverly to get him out of it.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Promposal: With Closet-Con imminent, Claire's on high alert and convinced there's a company mole. Phil goes vigilante when he and Gloria confront Alice for stealing her recipe.

programme.title: Live Football: Semi-Finals...
programme.desc: ...AFCON: We're down to the final four at the Africa Cup of Nations. This first semi-final comes from Tangier Grand Stadium.

programme.title: Live Football: Semi-Finals...
programme.desc: ...AFCON: The second AFCON 2025 semi-final, live from Prince Moulay Abdellah Stadium in Rabat.

programme.title: The Inbetweeners
programme.desc: Field Trip: It's a new term at Rudge Park comprehensive: time for the infamous sociology and geography field trip to Swanage...

programme.title: The Inbetweeners
programme.desc: Work Experience: Jay arranges work experience for himself and Simon at his dad's company, but a mix-up leaves Neil at a newspaper and Will at a garage.

programme.title: The Equalizer 2
programme.desc: (2018) Action crime thriller sequel. Denzel Washington returns as Robert McCall, who's out for revenge after ruthless killers murder an agency contact who he also considered a friend.

programme.title: The Integrity of Joseph Chambers
programme.desc: (2022) Robert Machoian's drama ponders the state of modern masculinity as a cack-handed insurance salesman played by Clayne Crawford heads solo to the woods for a fateful hunting trip.

programme.title: First Love
programme.desc: (2019) Takashi Miike's gory, violent crime-thriller. Budding boxer Leo helps a woman who's been forced into sex work but gets more than he bargained for. In Japanese/subs.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: LumoTV: Getting Personal
programme.desc: Erika Jones meets gay rugby player Wayne Sharples to find out about some of the challenges he's faced growing up and why he has such a passion for his chosen sport.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: D-Day the Sixth of June
programme.desc: (1956) Wartime romance set against the background of the D-Day landings, starring Robert Taylor and Dana Wynter. A married American officer embarks on an affair with English nurse.

programme.title: Rio Grande
programme.desc: (1950) Western. John Wayne plays the commander of a Texan fort at which his ex-wife (Maureen O'Hara) pitches up. Can he win back her love by saving kidnapped children from Apache raiders?

programme.title: Buchanan Rides Alone
programme.desc: (1958) Western. Randolph Scott stars as a drifter who arrives in a small border town and tangles with a group of villains after helping a wealthy young Mexican, played by Manuel Rojas.

programme.title: Film4 Interview Programmes:...
programme.desc: ...Talking Film: Stars and directors talk about the experience of making movies in this compendium of personal and practical reflections.

programme.title: Earth vs the Flying Saucers
programme.desc: (1956) Sci-fi thriller. Hugh Marlowe stars as a scientist who discovers Earth is threatened by a fleet of flying saucers bent on global conquest. With special effects by Ray Harryhausen.

programme.title: Entrapment
programme.desc: (1999) Action thriller starring Sean Connery as Robert 'Mac' MacDougal, one of the world's finest art thieves, and Catherine Zeta-Jones as the insurance company agent out to trap him.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Rogue Nation
programme.desc: (2015) Part five of the Tom Cruise action-thriller franchise. The secret agents must bring down a terrorist group, but that's not easy when the CIA are hunting you down...

programme.title: A Most Wanted Man
programme.desc: (2014) Thriller with Philip Seymour Hoffman. The arrival of a refugee in Hamburg sparks a flurry of intelligence activity. Is he an asylum seeker or a terrorist? Strong language/violence.

programme.title: Like a Boss
programme.desc: (2020) Comedy with Tiffany Haddish and Rose Byrne. When two best friends find their beauty business in dire financial difficulty, they turn to a scary CEO for help.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: The Bedford Incident
programme.desc: (1965) Thriller. Sidney Poitier plays a photojournalist aboard a destroyer whose commander's obsessive hunt for a Soviet sub could plunge the world into nuclear war.

programme.title: Broken Arrow
programme.desc: (1950) Western starring James Stewart. A gold prospector, tired of reprisal killings between whites and Native Americans, offers a truce to the Apaches' leader. But tensions resurface.

programme.title: Ten Tall Men
programme.desc: (1951) Comedy adventure. Burt Lancaster stars as a Foreign Legion sergeant leading nine men on a dangerous mission to prevent a Berber attack on a North African desert fort.

programme.title: Von Ryan's Express
programme.desc: (1965) Second World War adventure. Frank Sinatra stars as the leader of Allied prisoners of war attempting to slip the clutches of their Italian captors. Co-starring Trevor Howard.

programme.title: The Old Man and the Gun
programme.desc: (2018) Crime biopic. Robert Redford stars as charming 74-year-old robber Forrest Tucker. He's still robbing banks when he falls for farmer Jewel (Sissy Spacek). But the cops still want him.

programme.title: Heat
programme.desc: (1995) Al Pacino and Robert De Niro star in Michael Mann's crime thriller. A cop sets out to track down a career criminal and his gang of armed robbers. Violence/strong language.

programme.title: Bad Times at the El Royale
programme.desc: (2018) Crime thriller with Jeff Bridges, Jon Hamm, Dakota Johnson and Chris Hemsworth. Shifty strangers collide in a sleazy-but-glamorous deserted motel with its own buried secrets.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: The Black Shield of Falworth
programme.desc: (1954) Medieval action-adventure starring Tony Curtis and Janet Leigh. When a peasant discovers his true lineage, he sets out to woo his noble sweetheart and avenge his father's murder.

programme.title: The Spoilers
programme.desc: (1955) Western. Anne Baxter, Jeff Chandler and Rory Calhoun star in a tale of fortune-seeking and treachery on the untamed Alaskan frontier.

programme.title: The Bravados
programme.desc: (1958) Brooding western starring Joan Collins and Gregory Peck. A man hunts down the four escaped prisoners who he believes are responsible for the murder of his wife.

programme.title: Film4 Interview Programmes:...
programme.desc: ...Talking Film: Stars and directors talk about the experience of making movies in this compendium of personal and practical reflections.

programme.title: The Enemy Below
programme.desc: (1957) Second World War thriller. Robert Mitchum stars as the captain of a US destroyer in the North Atlantic hunting down a German U-boat and its world-weary captain, Curt Jurgens.

programme.title: I, Robot
programme.desc: (2004) Sci-fi thriller with Will Smith. In 2035, a technophobic cop investigates a crime that may have been perpetrated by a robot. Can he keep an open mind?

programme.title: Commando
programme.desc: (1985) Thriller starring Arnold Schwarzenegger. To free his kidnapped daughter, an ex US commando must agree to assassinate a South American president. But he's not as pliant as he seems...

programme.title: The Last Stand
programme.desc: (2013) Thriller starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Johnny Knoxville and Forest Whitaker. A small-town sheriff and his inexperienced staff take on a drug cartel boss who's fleeing to Mexico.

programme.desc: Join Alex for two hours of lively debate and news making interviews. Top guests tackle the big issues of the day with Alex's fresh take on every story.

programme.desc: Tomorrow's news, tonight. All the major stories making the front pages and full coverage of all the breaking news at home and abroad with Alex Armstrong.

programme.title: Bangers & Cash
programme.desc: Vanden Plas/Ford Fiesta XR2: Dave's on his way to Grimsby to pick up an iconic 80s fast Ford, the Mk1 Fiesta XR2.

programme.title: Bangers & Cash
programme.desc: Alvis 12/50/Alfetta/RS2000: Derek gets a tour of Hadlow Castle in Kent when he arrives to collect the owner's pre-war Alvis and an immaculate Citroen used by the Gestapo in occupied France.

programme.title: Bangers & Cash
programme.desc: BMW Z4 Batmobile/Ford Army Jeep: Derek is picking up two expertly crafted Batmobile replicas in the home counties and Dave can't control his enthusiasm for a Ford US wartime jeep.

programme.title: Bangers & Cash
programme.desc: Burlington Arrow/Vauxhall Cresta: Paul is picking up a stunning 1961 Vauxhall Cresta, inspired by American design, the car changed the face of British motoring.

programme.title: Bangers & Cash
programme.desc: Rover 3500/Citroen H Van: Derek inspects a brace of old cop cars including a Rover P6 complete with radio, sirens and V8 engine, and a former Mod waves ciao to his collection of 1960s Italian scooters

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Shopping from Home.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Birmingham to the Potteries: Armed with his Bradshaw's guide, Michael Portillo reaches Birmingham and learns how a radical reformer would make his mark on the 'city of a thousand trades'.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Newry to Portadown: Michael Portillo sets off on the first leg of a journey across Northern Ireland to Argyll and Bute, beginning by travelling from Newry to Portadown.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Belfast to Portrush: On a journey from Belfast to Portrush, Michael Portillo investigates the work of author and Narnia creator CS Lewis, and visits the Royal Portrush Golf Club.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Larne to Dumfries: Michael Portillo journeys from Northern Ireland across the water to Scotland. Leaving from the seaport of Larne, he reaches Stranraer and the Mull of Galloway.

programme.title: Bangers & Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: Volvo / Audi / Hillman: The Restoring Classics team take Derek's advice when he sniffs out the rarest car they've ever taken on - the last remaining Hillman GT.

programme.title: Bangers & Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: Land Rover / Argocat: The team lift the shutters on their biggest restoration to date in the shape of a Series 1 Land Rover. But does that mean record profit or history making loss?

programme.title: Rise of the Nazis
programme.desc: Barbarossa: Hitler now faces fellow ruthless dictator Josef Stalin and tries to deceive him with a plan to invade Britain while preparing an attack on the Soviet Union.

programme.title: True Evil: The Making Of A Nazi
programme.desc: Adolf Eichmann: A profile of Adolf Eichmann, the bureaucratic civil servant whose robotic willingness to follow orders led him to design the system that would bring about the holocaust.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Battle Abbey 1: Fiona Bruce and the team visit Battle Abbey in East Sussex, where a Beatles guitar with an enviable history turns out to be one of the shows most valuable items.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Salisbury Cathedral 2: Fiona Bruce presents from Salisbury Cathedral, where the experts assess letters from Enid Blyton and original drawings of Judge Dredd.

programme.title: Bangers & Cash
programme.desc: Austin Gipsy / Toyota MR2 Ferrari: Derek heads to Scotland in a rainstorm to pick up a Jaguar E-type and a rare MGC convertible, and Dave extracts a rare Austin Gipsey from a lock-up.

programme.title: Bangers & Cash
